abstract: Steven P. Jobs has been on a spectacular winning streak this decade, and the company would not be the same without him.
snippet: Steven P. Jobs has been on a spectacular winning streak this decade, and the company would not be the same without him.
lead_paragraph: APPLE’S share price leaped to a record after the company unveiled its latest device to be hailed as the coolest thing ever, but investors are factoring more into their decision than a best guess on the number of iPhones Apple will sell.

headline.main: Figuring Out the P.E. Ratio of Steve Jobs
headline.print_headline: Figuring Out The P.E. Ratio Of Steve Jobs
